text: Steven Anderson is a professional basketball referee who worked in the National Basketball Association (NBA) for four seasons (2013-2017).http://mediacentral.nba.com/media/mediacentral/Officials-Guide.pdf He wore the uniform number 35. Anderson resides in Orlando, Florida.http://www.referee.com/resources/officiating-rosters/nba-roster/ He is an alumnus of the University of Central Florida, from where he received a bachelor's degree in education and a master's degree in higher education.http://today.ucf.edu/referee-u-meet-two-nba-officials-learned-trade- ucf/ He has been an international basketball official for FIBA since 2011. He was selected to officiate at the 2014 FIBA World Cup and worked the third- place game. He was also selected to officiate the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro as the only American to work the Men's basketball tournament. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:National Basketball Association referees Category:Sportspeople from Orlando, Florida Category:University of Central Florida alumni Category:Basketball people from Florida
